document_data.name: Icerim Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Icerim Mountains''' were located in the far northern expanses of the [[Hordelands]] bordering [[Narfell]] and [[Rashemen]].
document_data.Geography: These mountains were once part of the [[Great Glacier]], but a recession of the ice over the centuries had separated the Icerim.
document_data.History: The mountain range was once home to the two realms of [[Dareth]] and [[Hoarfaern]], with Dareth laying in the central parts of the mountains that divided the [[Great Glacier]] from the [[Great Ice Sea]], and the Hoarfaern located in the northern end of the mountains.
document_data.Inhabitants: Many tribes lived within the Icerim Mountains, including the [[Tark]], [[Chif]], and [[Dagranost]].
